This is in the View menu. The zoom size on this tab should also affect the popup.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":71,"length":4,"style":"CODE"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dubeu","text":"Why this works","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ca56d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b41m1","text":"Chrome stores the font-size preference on a per-domain basis. You can see this by opening two tabs to the same page, and changing font size on one, and that it changes the other.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d7hdb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cgf53","text":"By taking advantage of this property, we're able to open the MetaMask view in a tab, where we have access to font size controls, even though WebExtensions don't usually have a way to change their font size.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
